definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: palm-tree, date-palm, Phoenix dactylifera;—´[[ת]]: Joe 1:12; in sim. of prosperity Ps 92:13, of (graceful) stature Ct So 7:8, cf. (fig.) v:9; pl. [[תְּמָרִים]] in oasis Ex 15:27 (J), ‖ Nu 33:9 (P); ´[[כַּפּׂת ת]]: Le 23:40 (H) palm-branches, cf. ´[[עֲלֵי ת]]: Ne 8:15; [[עִיר הַתְּמָרִים]] = Jericho De 34:3 (JE), 2Ch 28:15, Ju Jdg 1:16, Jdg 3:13.—Vid. Post:Hast. DB PALM-TREE M’Lean:Ency. Bib. ID. Tr:NHB 378 ff. Theob. Fischer:Dattelpalme, 1881.
